label: 藤原周光
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (?1087-?1165). Son of Atsumoto. Grandson of Akihira. Brother of Shigeaki and Yoshiaki. Friend oｆ Renzen; they once traveled to Kyushu together. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (101). Comp. Zoku honchō shūku, Shūi kaku 拾遺佳句, and supposed compiler of the Honchō mudaishi. [敦基、明衡、茂明、令明、蓮禅、九州、漢詩、続本朝秀句]
